intro: Cynoglossum amabile var. parviflorum, commonly known as small-flowered honesty, is a flowering plant in the family Boraginaceae. It is characterized by its blue to violet flowers and heart-shaped leaves. The plant is native to Europe and is often found in meadows and grasslands. It blooms in late summer and is known for its delicate appearance and short flowering period. The seeds, which resemble tiny white buttons, are also a notable feature of this species.
